attributes.action: to make the oil companies reflect the changes in the price of oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as people we are fed up with the oil comapies take take take attitude ,as the price of oil went up in price so did the price of petrol on a daily basis , but as it has come down in price on a daily basis the oil companies have not been so quick of the mark they are just profiteering . The goverment must force the oil companies to reduce the price as it falls not when they feel like to make more money out of a bad situation . These companies are making millions a day and yet they still feel the need not to reduce the petrol prices as it falls .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
